bookingUid.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the booking to reschedule. Obtained from the get_all_bookings response.

newStartTime.description: The new start time for the booking in ISO 8601 format with timezone (e.g., 2025-12-19T15:00:00Z)

reschedulingReason.description: Optional reason for rescheduling (e.g., 'Customer requested new time', 'Original time no longer available')
